title: Teen faces murder charges in fatal Pikesville shooting
content:
PIKESVILLE, Md. —
A 15-year-old has been charged as an adult in the fatal shooting of a 17-year-old Pikesville boy.
Police said Blake Hammond died after he was shot around on July 28 in the 2400 block of Washington Boulevard.
Detectives identified 15-year-old Tarik Kelly as the suspect. He was arrested on Saturday, police said.
Kelly is being held at Central Booking without bail. He has been charged with first-degree murder.
